GT.content: literature & its relation to capital, city, polis, transformation of monetary forms [late capitalism] (dematerializaiton of money & all the scenes that depend on it)
GT.linkedContent: literature & its relation to capital, city, polis, transformation of monetary forms [late capitalism] (dematerializaiton of money & all the scenes that depend on it)

R.content: democracy acc. Plato [in Republic (Book 8)] looks to Derrida like a bazaar, a carnival, pre-capitalist marketplace, complete lack of authority, soft like Orpheus
R.linkedContent: democracy acc. Plato [in Republic (Book 8)] looks to Derrida like a bazaar, a carnival, pre-capitalist marketplace, complete lack of authority, soft like Orpheus

FK.content: mondialatinization (strange alliance btwn Christianity, as experience of death of God, & tele-technoscientific capitalism) is at same time hegemonic & finite, “ultra-powerful” and in process of exhausting itself
FK.linkedContent: mondialatinization (strange alliance btwn Christianity, as experience of death of God, & tele-technoscientific capitalism) is at same time hegemonic & finite, “ultra-powerful” and in process of exhausting itself

FK.content: no incompatibility btwn “return of religious” and rationality, which is to say, the tele-techno-capitalistic-scientific fiduciarity in all its mediatic/globalizing [mondial?] dimensions
FK.linkedContent: no incompatibility btwn “return of religious” and rationality, which is to say, the tele-techno-capitalistic-scientific fiduciarity in all its mediatic/globalizing [mondial?] dimensions

SPOM.content: Marx: “useless metal” of treasure, horde, becomes like burnt-out ashes (ausgebrannte Asche) of circulation, its caput mortuum; miser, speculator: a martyr to exchange value > dreams of pure exchange value
SPOM.linkedContent: Marx: “useless metal” of treasure, horde, becomes like burnt-out ashes (ausgebrannte Asche) of circulation, its caput mortuum; miser, speculator: a martyr to exchange value > dreams of pure exchange value

SPOM.content: exchange-value a properly spectral apparition if this figure did not prevent the proper
SPOM.linkedContent: exchange-value a properly spectral apparition if this figure did not prevent the proper

SPOM.content: speculation (the hoarder) is always fascinated, bewitched by the specter, devoted in his alchemy to haunting or return of revenants
SPOM.linkedContent: speculation (the hoarder) is always fascinated, bewitched by the specter, devoted in his alchemy to haunting or return of revenants

SPOM.content: [re: dominant discourse on Marxism] the triumphal stage of work of mourning, maniac, jubilatory, animistic magic, rhythm of cadenced march [“Marx is dead,” long live capitalism]
SPOM.linkedContent: [re: dominant discourse on Marxism] the triumphal stage of work of mourning, maniac, jubilatory, animistic magic, rhythm of cadenced march [“Marx is dead,” long live capitalism]

SPOM.content: “there was never just capital, nor capitalism in the singular, but capitalisms plural”
SPOM.linkedContent: “there was never just capital, nor capitalism in the singular, but capitalisms plural”

SPOM.content: triumph of liberal capitalism & its predestined alliance w/ democracy has never been so critical, fragile, threatened
SPOM.linkedContent: triumph of liberal capitalism & its predestined alliance w/ democracy has never been so critical, fragile, threatened

SPOM.content: the table, wood table, armed head to toe: origin of exchange-value, birth of capital, of mysticism and the secret [?]
SPOM.linkedContent: the table, wood table, armed head to toe: origin of exchange-value, birth of capital, of mysticism and the secret [?]

SPOM.content: Marx uses religious model to understand ideology of capitalism [Žižek]
SPOM.linkedContent: Marx uses religious model to understand ideology of capitalism [Žižek]

SPOM.content: animism of wood, already matter becoming-immaterial, what would enlightenment be w/out the market? will there ever be progress w/out exchange-value?
SPOM.linkedContent: animism of wood, already matter becoming-immaterial, what would enlightenment be w/out the market? will there ever be progress w/out exchange-value?

SPOM.content: capital contradiction, at origin of capital: induces the “pragmatic” double constraint of all injunctions [see POO p. 143n difference btwn “use” & “mention”]
SPOM.linkedContent: capital contradiction, at origin of capital: induces the “pragmatic” double constraint of all injunctions [see POO p. 143n difference btwn “use” & “mention”]

SPOM.content: table dances spontaneously, autonomously, but it moves others too
SPOM.linkedContent: table dances spontaneously, autonomously, but it moves others too

SPOM.content: not just contradiction of sensuous non-sensuous in same Thing, but contradiction of automatic autonomy (spontaneity) > on stage of market, table (commodity) is a prosthesis of itself
SPOM.linkedContent: not just contradiction of sensuous non-sensuous in same Thing, but contradiction of automatic autonomy (spontaneity) > on stage of market, table (commodity) is a prosthesis of itself

SPOM.content: use-value before exchange value, hulē of wood, ordinary sensuous thing, table before dance > but it must have promised itself to iterability, no use-value w/out possibility of exchange & culture, of an hors-d’usage
SPOM.linkedContent: use-value before exchange value, hulē of wood, ordinary sensuous thing, table before dance > but it must have promised itself to iterability, no use-value w/out possibility of exchange & culture, of an hors-d’usage

SPOM.content: “a culture began before culture—and humanity, capitalization also,” a culture destined to survive them: exchange-value is exceeded by the gift, market equivalence arrests the dance (of the commodity) it seemed to initiate
SPOM.linkedContent: “a culture began before culture—and humanity, capitalization also,” a culture destined to survive them: exchange-value is exceeded by the gift, market equivalence arrests the dance (of the commodity) it seemed to initiate

SPOM.content: “if capitalization has no rigorous limit, it is also because it comes itself to be exceeded”
SPOM.linkedContent: “if capitalization has no rigorous limit, it is also because it comes itself to be exceeded”

SPOM.content: does Marx’s exorcism sign and seal the whole logic of Capital? however virtual, preparatory > is this conjuration ceremony, vital surviving oath, injunction, what puts Capital in motion, and part of the revolutionary promise?
SPOM.linkedContent: does Marx’s exorcism sign and seal the whole logic of Capital? however virtual, preparatory > is this conjuration ceremony, vital surviving oath, injunction, what puts Capital in motion, and part of the revolutionary promise?

SPOM.content: is the ghost just the effect of the market economy? as Marx says, a finite delirium, a madness that will come to an end? same for spectrality in general?
SPOM.linkedContent: is the ghost just the effect of the market economy? as Marx says, a finite delirium, a madness that will come to an end? same for spectrality in general?

FWT.content: SPOM indicates Derrida’s respect for communist “idea,” necessity for untiring deconstructive critique of capitalistic logic
FWT.linkedContent: SPOM indicates Derrida’s respect for communist “idea,” necessity for untiring deconstructive critique of capitalistic logic

DPi.content: “worldwide market dominated by laws & a philosophy of international law that are European & Romano-Christian”
DPi.linkedContent: “worldwide market dominated by laws & a philosophy of international law that are European & Romano-Christian”

DPi.content: zone btwn capital of capital punishment (de-cap-itation) & capital of capitalism (capitalization) causes vertigo, relations murky, when calculating drive, interest of capital, is no longer calculable and becomes virtually infinite, when death w/out return is part of market there where it can’t be, where it ought to remain incalculable > theologico-political: phantasm of infinitization in heart of finitude
DPi.linkedContent: zone btwn capital of capital punishment (de-cap-itation) & capital of capitalism (capitalization) causes vertigo, relations murky, when calculating drive, interest of capital, is no longer calculable and becomes virtually infinite, when death w/out return is part of market there where it can’t be, where it ought to remain incalculable > theologico-political: phantasm of infinitization in heart of finitude

LI.content: Limited Inc as internal regulation by which capitalist system seeks to limit concentration and decision-making power: to protect itself from its own crisis (psychoanalysis’ incorporation)
LI.linkedContent: Limited Inc as internal regulation by which capitalist system seeks to limit concentration and decision-making power: to protect itself from its own crisis (psychoanalysis’ incorporation)

BSi.content: events of 9/11: know-how of archive, technical reproducibility part of event (political-economy/power of media) > knowing how to cause fear, making known: virtuality of the worst
BSi.linkedContent: events of 9/11: know-how of archive, technical reproducibility part of event (political-economy/power of media) > knowing how to cause fear, making known: virtuality of the worst

BSi.content: no capital w/out accredited fable > w/ real effects [logic of market part of logic of war]
BSi.linkedContent: no capital w/out accredited fable > w/ real effects [logic of market part of logic of war]

OG.content: writing’s instrumentalization, the suspension of being-upright (cf. FS, PS) > writing’s structural solidarity w/ capitalization [Rousseau, Engels, Court de Gebelin]
OG.linkedContent: writing’s instrumentalization, the suspension of being-upright (cf. FS, PS) > writing’s structural solidarity w/ capitalization [Rousseau, Engels, Court de Gebelin]

OG.content: acc. Rousseau & Duclos [via Lévi-Strauss’ tribe w/out writing], degradation of politics/community caused by degradation of language—bad pronunciation, shortened words, caused by capital, aristocracy: speech of the assembly dispossessed from the people by written law (from Rome & Greece to empires of great distance)
OG.linkedContent: acc. Rousseau & Duclos [via Lévi-Strauss’ tribe w/out writing], degradation of politics/community caused by degradation of language—bad pronunciation, shortened words, caused by capital, aristocracy: speech of the assembly dispossessed from the people by written law (from Rome & Greece to empires of great distance)

OG.content: age of labor, civil society, l’homme policé, money & phonetic writing—elle gagne en universalité: signifiers that are nonsignifying, circulation of arbitrary signs in phonetic writing, alphabet is commercial, a trader > anonymous supplement substituted for a thing
OG.linkedContent: age of labor, civil society, l’homme policé, money & phonetic writing—elle gagne en universalité: signifiers that are nonsignifying, circulation of arbitrary signs in phonetic writing, alphabet is commercial, a trader > anonymous supplement substituted for a thing

OG.content: for Rousseau, capital contrary to sovereignty of people [degradation of writing]
OG.linkedContent: for Rousseau, capital contrary to sovereignty of people [degradation of writing]

ATAP.content: acc. Kant, philosopher and shopkeeper write in prose
ATAP.linkedContent: acc. Kant, philosopher and shopkeeper write in prose

UWC.content: new technical “stage” of virtualization > the accelerated rhythm/extent/power of capitalization of such virtuality: digitalization, computerization, virtually immediate mondialisation of readability destabilize university habitat, topology of event no longer “campus”
UWC.linkedContent: new technical “stage” of virtualization > the accelerated rhythm/extent/power of capitalization of such virtuality: digitalization, computerization, virtually immediate mondialisation of readability destabilize university habitat, topology of event no longer “campus”

UWC.content: worldwide market violently inegalitarian > capitalistic situation more tragic in absolute figures than ever
UWC.linkedContent: worldwide market violently inegalitarian > capitalistic situation more tragic in absolute figures than ever

EU.content: State or trans-State capitalist powers, re: storage of information in data banks > once library no longer ideal type of archive: university no longer “guardian” or “trustee” of knowledge (this centralizing representation once constituted mission of university itself)
EU.linkedContent: State or trans-State capitalist powers, re: storage of information in data banks > once library no longer ideal type of archive: university no longer “guardian” or “trustee” of knowledge (this centralizing representation once constituted mission of university itself)

SPEC.content: [re: Freud’s speculation, a logic beyond that of position] the “position’s” fall (chute) would cause bankruptcy, ruin, discredit: today I’ll speak of speculation, I’m betting I will
SPEC.linkedContent: [re: Freud’s speculation, a logic beyond that of position] the “position’s” fall (chute) would cause bankruptcy, ruin, discredit: today I’ll speak of speculation, I’m betting I will
